title: CAN_PED_RAGDOLL
content:
0x128F79EDCECE4FD50xC0EFB7A3// CanPedRagdoll
BOOL CAN_PED_RAGDOLL(Ped ped);Prevents the ped from going limp.  
[Example: Can prevent peds from falling when standing on moving vehicles.]
codeBlocks:
Prevents the ped from going limp.  
[Example: Can prevent peds from falling when standing on moving vehicles.]
